name: Eye to Eye (kolebas)
description:
In case the web version doesn’t work in Chrome, try using Mozilla Firefox.

Two little eyes battle it out as the tension, as well as the slow-moving but deadly acid, constantly rises.

How to Play

  • start turn - Return
  • move - left and right arrows or A and D
  • jump - up arrow or space
  • aim - mouse /  touchpad
  • fire - left click on mouse / touchpad or left Ctrl

A simple but atmospheric turn-based platformer. Compete against a friend or your alternative personality. Strategically think through your turns and try not to disintegrate as you're slowly running out of space.

Credits

Andreas Ragen Ayal - project lead, programming, game design

Hendrik Eerikson - programming, game design

Raido Uudel - art

Mykola Herasymovych - sound

Soundtrack: https://soundcloud.com/mykola-herasymovych/eye2eye-soundtrack
